sentences.english: At some stage he left the Artillery to command a radar unit.

sentences.english: His boots and purple beret identify him as commanding the Scottish Paratroops.

sentences.english: In that battle, they brought the artillery into action.

sentences.english: Later, the honorable artillery company gave the prince a 62 gun salute at the tower of London.
